definition.text: When you select the option to cancel the Angle to Parent setting, the node is free to take any angle relative to its parent and siblings!

paragraphs.text: Open the menu of the Trading Parameters node, select the option to cancel the Angle to Parent setting, and move the node in any direction!
As you can see, the node stays where you leave it, and the dotted line connecting to its parent turns yellow. Notice that both the angle to the parent node and the distance become arbitrary.
